title: Instant Pot 140-4002-01 Vortex Air Fryer, 19QT, Black
description: The Instant Omni® Plus is a high-performance countertop air fryer toaster oven. It’s big enough tocook up to four portions of food and is perfect for growing families. With 10 cooking functions, the Omni Plus helps you create quick, delicious and healthy homemade meals. It sports a rotisserie function, EvenCrisp™ technology for golden, crispy results and more. The Omni Plus offers the quality, convenience and versatility you’ve come to expect from Instant –Discover Amazing.
